noCharacters: No characters logged in. Add a character to view assets.
noData: No asset data loaded. Click Update in the header to fetch from ESI.
settingsModal.title: Asset View Settings
settingsModal.description: Choose which data sources to include in asset totals
settingsModal.marketOrdersDesc: Include items from active sell orders
settingsModal.contractsDesc: Include items from outstanding contracts you issued
settingsModal.industryJobsDesc: Include items from active and ready industry jobs
settingsModal.activeShipDesc: Include your currently piloted ship and its contents
settingsModal.structuresDesc: Include owned structures (Citadels, Engineering Complexes, etc.)
